description: The Canon Monopod 100 is a compact, lightweight 4-section monopod that comes with a mini-ballhead. It features a foam grip on the top leg section, a hand strap, and rubber leg tip.Specifications:Maximum height: 64.5 inchesFolded length: 21.3 inchesLoad capacity: 4.4 poundsLeg lock type: Flip lockMale thread size: 1/4-inchWeight: 1.1 pound
title: Canon Monopod 100 for SLR Cameras & Lenses
